TextView.android:text: What it does is, as this ^ suggests, keeps WiFi on while your phone is awake. To enable this, (and there are many ways.. I'll give you the way I'd do it.) Go to settings>WiFi>WiFi settings (3 vertical dots)>Advanced settings>keep WiFi on during sleep.. And set it to 'always' or.. You can use tricksterMOD and enable that via the GUI (Graphical User Interface)
